word: Jesus promised his disciples, \93The Comforter, the Holy Ghost, whom the Father will send in my name, he shall teach you all things, and bring all things to your remembrance, whatsoever I have said unto you.\94 [John 14:26.] But the teachings of Christ must previously have been stored in the mind, in order for the Spirit of God to bring them to our remembrance in the time of peril. \93Thy Word have I hid in mine heart,\94 said David, \93that I might not sin against thee.\94 [Psalm 119:11.]
